body: Hi, I just started working with honeybee but I ran into a problem I get 0% of daylight factor all the time, even when using a simple box. Ideally I would like to use also the FRAMES object for shading, but connecting it gives me error My honeybee component is orange - it says I do not have energy plus installed, even after installation I am attaching my file [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZuR8thm*Gj-GGeVev5HuQul7O*SSX89nFEJ7xsR0DEhU1zyXIHE1W70USUa-YBKUerMbUwV-BtGcxLHPt74uz-sRFkA5gelI/df.JPG)
